title: Help, accidentally bought instead of gifted.
body: I added riot points to my account to gift one of my friends the new Project: Ashe skin, I accidentally bought it instead of gifting it. Can I refund the Riot points back from the purchase. I haven't used the skin and I will not use it. I wanna just gift it to my friend.

replies.body:
So, did you get your refund? :o
I'm going through the same thing now :\

Hey Swear Bears! 

If you have one or more of your original refund tokens, then you can definitely refund this purchase! For the steps on how to process the refund, check out this section of the Content Refund FAQ:
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q1

If you don't have any more refund tokens, unfortunately your refund cannot be processed. Their policy regarding this is detailed in the same support article:
> #CAN I HAVE MORE TOKENS?
>No. Our standard policy for a long time was to not offer refunds, and these recent changes were implemented to better assist our players. Every account is given three refund tokens in order to give Summoners an opportunity to exchange content that they regretted purchasing or bought accidentally. In other words, you are provided with three exceptions to our no refund policy, and we will not be able to provide you with more tokens once they are all used up.

>Before purchasing content, we highly recommend taking a look at our previews for skins and champions in our Forums or in the Champion Spotlight videos to ensure that you are making an informed purchase.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q2

> If you don't have any more refund tokens, unfortunately your refund cannot be processed. Their policy regarding this is detailed in the same support article:

> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q2

Well your whole post just got proven wrong so.

It always makes me happy to see friends gift each other, and we'd like to help with this!  Reach out to us in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can look into this and find some options for you.  You may need to have some info like the transaction on-hand, and we will respond to your ticket asap!
